stories.Title: Meet the “Sleeper Agents”
stories.Description: Scientists at Anthropic have encountered an intriguing circumstance that could jeopardize traditional safety training, as AI models learning deceptive behaviors demonstrate an ability to outsmart them.
stories.Tweet: Meet the “Sleeper Agents” 📦 Scientists at Anthropic have encountered an intriguing circumstance that could jeopardize traditional safety training, as AI models learning deceptive behaviors demonstrate an ability to outsmart them. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/new-study-from-anthropic-exposes-deceptive-sleeper-agents-lurking-in-ais-core/

stories.Title: Short-lived journey
stories.Description: Artifact, the innovation from the minds of Instagram's co-founders, couldn't withstand the test of time. The news app with AI-centric features is closing after a year.
stories.Tweet: Short-lived journey 📦 Artifact, the innovation from the minds of Instagram's co-founders, couldn't withstand the test of time. The news app with AI-centric features is closing after a year. #ai https://www.engadget.com/instagrams-founders-are-shutting-down-artifact-their-year-old-news-app-233431390.html

stories.Title: NASA's Sonic marvel
stories.Description: We were finally able to watch NASA's X-59 Quesst in all its glory as the agency and Lockheed Martin unveiled the groundbreaking plane designed to make supersonic flights "quieter."
stories.Tweet: NASA's Sonic marvel 📦 We were finally able to watch NASA's X-59 Quesst in all its glory as the agency and Lockheed Martin unveiled the groundbreaking plane designed to make supersonic flights "quieter." #science https://www.space.com/nasa-x-59-quesst-supersonic-jet-unveiled

stories.Title: Complete laser action
stories.Description: As the problem of space debris continues to scale, more startups are developing innovative ways to tackle it. EX-Fusion, hailing from Osaka, has an exciting plan: ground-based lasers.
stories.Tweet: Complete laser action 📦 As the problem of space debris continues to scale, more startups are developing innovative ways to tackle it. EX-Fusion, hailing from Osaka, has an exciting plan: ground-based lasers. #space https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/japanese-startup-vaporize-space-junk

stories.Title: Transforming cancer studies
stories.Description: Researchers at MIT are bringing a beacon of hope for pancreatic cancer detection with the development of two AI models capable of identifying it in its early stages.
stories.Tweet: Transforming cancer studies 📦 Researchers at MIT are bringing a beacon of hope for pancreatic cancer detection with the development of two AI models capable of identifying it in its early stages. #science https://interestingengineering.com/health/ai-early-pancreatic-cancer-intervention

stories.Title: A burning end
stories.Description: After performing all possible actions in its challenging situation, Astrobotic's Peregrine lander journey is set for a fiery ending as it prepares for Earth reentry on Jan 18.
stories.Tweet: A burning end 📦 After performing all possible actions in its challenging situation, Astrobotic's Peregrine lander journey is set for a fiery ending as it prepares for Earth reentry on Jan 18. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/peregrine-lunar-lander-on-earth-reentry-trajectory/

stories.Title: The third time's the charm
stories.Description: Elon Musk is confident that the next Starship flight might be the real deal, mentioning that the last test, where a propellant dump caused destruction, could have reached orbit with a payload.
stories.Tweet: The third time's the charm 📦 Elon Musk is confident that the next Starship flight might be the real deal, mentioning that the last test, where a propellant dump caused destruction, could have reached orbit with a payload. #spacex https://spacenews.com/spacex-says-propellant-venting-caused-loss-of-second-starship/

stories.Title: Round of applause
stories.Description: It seems Microsoft has come to steal Apple's spotlight, positioning itself as the world's most valuable publicly traded company, with AI playing a significant role in this triumph.
stories.Tweet: Round of applause 📦 It seems Microsoft has come to steal Apple's spotlight, positioning itself as the world's most valuable publicly traded company, with AI playing a significant role in this triumph. #microsoft https://www.businessinsider.com/microsoft-becomes-world-most-valuable-company-market-cap-apple-ai-2024-1

stories.Title: Not a speedy visit
stories.Description: Trying the Vision Pro may feel like a visit to an optometrist. Mark Gurman reports that Apple is gearing up for in-store demos that involve face and glasses scans, calibration, and custom assembly.
stories.Tweet: Not a speedy visit 📦 Trying the Vision Pro may feel like a visit to an optometrist. Mark Gurman reports that Apple is gearing up for in-store demos that involve face and glasses scans, calibration, and custom assembly. #apple https://www.engadget.com/if-you-want-to-demo-the-vision-pro-at-an-apple-store-prepare-to-be-there-a-while-172207401.html

stories.Title: LG charging lands in the US
stories.Description: After only being available in South Korea, LG Electronics has inaugurated an EV charging facility in Texas, to integrate itself into North America's competitive EV market.
stories.Tweet: LG charging lands in the US 📦 After only being available in South Korea, LG Electronics has inaugurated an EV charging facility in Texas, to integrate itself into North America's competitive EV market. #electricvehicles https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/14/lg-opens-its-first-us-ev-charging-factory-in-texas/

title: Anthropic's revelation, Starship's upcoming test, Apple's Vision Pro experience
description: A recent study from Anthropic has revealed that certain AI models are capable of outsmarting traditional safety measures, giving a false sense of security. Elon Musk is dead certain that Starship's third flight will probably make it to orbit, so why not throw in some bets, right? And, as we're all hyped up for Vision Pro's arrival, here's a heads-up: we might be chilling in the Apple Store for a long time. When they say the experience is immersive, they aren't kidding.
